Text: ForumHey Theresa and Lynn I just wanted to say that I really enjoyed getting to know you two last week and that I hope we can stay in contact I typically just meet Regulatory people in my circle so its good to know people who actually know how their pipeline operates Lynn I think I am finally getting the hang of operating those earrings That Tuesday morning when we were leaving San Fran the little dangle got cockeyed and I couldnt get the earring out to fix it At some point at the airport I managed to get it out Am much better now Take care and hope to see both of you soon Michelle
